Player History
Drafted in 7th round, 196th overall pick, by Cleveland in 2013...
Traded from Cleveland to Houston on 7/31/2016 (Going to HOU: RF K. Cuyler Jr., 1B R. Gonzales, 1B T. Conde, CF H. Rice Jr., 2B T. Ripple. Going to CLE: P R. Reynolds Jr.)...
Had first career hit on 4/6/2019, off Aroldis Chapman (MIL)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/6/2019, off Jose Delapaz (MIL)...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/24/2019, hitting .515 with 1 HR, 6 RBI...
Traded from Houston to Los Angeles (A) on 6/30/2019 (Going to HOU: C C. Santana, 2B B. Crawford, P L. Rojas, P B. Smith. Going to LAA: 1B R. Gonzales)...
Had 21-game hitting streak snapped on 7/13/2019...
Injured on 7/3/2020 with a Torn Groin Muscle, out for 6 weeks...
Injured on 8/14/2021 with a Broken Ankle, out for full season...
Won World Championship with Los Angeles (A) in 2022...
